title: What are the Physically Strongest Zodiac Signs?

steps.title: Tough and strong, the bull has the most physical strength in the zodiac.
steps.content: Tough and strong, the bull has the most physical strength in the zodiac. Tenacious Taurus boasts more physical strength and durability than the typical zodiac sign. Influenced by Venus, the planet of beauty and love, the bull also loves chasing after the finer things in life, whether that’s eating the tastiest food, wearing the best clothes, or looking the best that they possibly can. [1] X Research source This Venus-spurned motivation gives Taurus a natural push to work out and get physically strong (even if they’re pretty ripped already). Date Ranges: April 20 - May 20 Element: Earth Ruling Planet: Venus

steps.title: The active and fierce Leo has plenty of physical strength to go around.
steps.content: The active and fierce Leo has plenty of physical strength to go around. The regal lion is used to being on top. To satisfy this competitive side, Leo is always found in the middle of the action, whether it’s dominating the soccer field, beating their swim time, or killing it on the tennis courts. All of that exercise definitely leaves Leo looking buff, tough, and ready to take on the world. It doesn’t hurt that Leos love to show off. What better way to strut your stuff than by building up muscle and staying in shape? Date Ranges: July 23 - August 23 Element: Fire Ruling Planet: Sun

steps.title: Scorpio’s immense strength comes from their desire to give their all.
steps.content: Scorpio’s immense strength comes from their desire to give their all. The passionate scorpion is well-known as a sign of obsession. This applies to all aspects of a Scorpio’s life, including their physical health and strength. You can count on a Scorpio pushing themselves to the absolute limit during their workouts until they reach (and push past!) their fitness goals. Date Ranges: October 24 - November 21 Element: Water Ruling Planet: Pluto

steps.title: Active and adventurous Sagittarius is stronger than the average sign.
steps.content: Active and adventurous Sagittarius is stronger than the average sign. Sagittarius loves being outside and taking part in a lot of outdoor activities. The dynamic archer also really values having a sense of space and freedom. Spending plenty of quality time outdoors allows them to meet this goal while building strength in the process! Date Ranges: November 22 - December 21 Element: Fire Ruling Planet: Jupiter

steps.title: The hardworking goat stays in shape at their own pace.
steps.content: The hardworking goat stays in shape at their own pace. Capricorns are super ambitious, but like to approach their interests at a speed that’s comfortable for them. This includes fitness and physical strength. You’ll always catch Capricorn on their daily grind, whether that’s running on the treadmill, going for a walk, or biking around the neighborhood. They’re consistently building muscle, but they’re doing it at a structured, slower pace. Date Ranges: December 22 - January 19 Element: Earth Ruling Planet: Saturn

steps.title: The determined ram uses their strength to conquer any challenge.
steps.content: The determined ram uses their strength to conquer any challenge. Thanks to their ruling planet Mars, the planet of sports, passion, and aggression, Aries have a natural tendency to be more active than some of the other zodiac signs. [2] X Research source In fact, many Aries are well-known for their directness, aggressiveness, and love of a challenge. When you combine this with their natural Mars-bred instincts, it’s no wonder that Aries can pump a little extra iron. Date Ranges: March 21 - April 19 Element: Fire Ruling Planet: Mars
